mapper.update: update orderform_record set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express = #{express,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addresser = #{addresser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addressee = #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchandise = #{merchandise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopping_address = #{shoppingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, phone, number, express, addresser, addressee, merchandise, shopping_address, create_time from orderform_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
